rules_text:
First mate – Your starting deck contains “[i]Shining Horizon[/i]” and two lands of each basic land type. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
Whenever Captain Rosie Wright becomes tapped, you may sacrifice a Mountain or Forest. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Captain Rosie Wright, then search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
